item.Q:
Write the character: jūn

item.A:
traditional: 軍
army; military; arms
军队 (軍隊) jūnduì army troops
rénzào man-made; artificial; synthetic
zàizào reworking
jiànzào construct; build
gǎizào to change; to alter; to transform

traditional: 造價
zàojìa construction cost
zàofǎn rebel; revolt
zàoxíng modeling; to mold
zàojiù build up
zàochéng to bring about; to create; to cause
zàolín forestation
zàowùzhǔ the Creator (in Christianity or mythology); God
xìnniàn faith; belief; conviction

traditional: 念書
niànshū read; study

traditional: 念經
niànjīng recite or chant Buddhist scripture

traditional: 念頭
niàntou thought; idea; intention
sīniàn think of; long for; miss
xiǎngniàn miss; remember with longing; long to see again

traditional: 觀念
guānniàn notion; thought
bǎoliú continue to have; retain; hold back; reserve; reservations; hold back (approval or acceptance); to preserve; maintain

liúrèn to remain in office; to hold on to one's job
liúrén to stay in office

traditional: 留傳
liúchuán a legacy; to bequeath (to later generations)

traditional: 留學
liúxué to study abroad

traditional: 留學生
liúxuéshēng student studying abroad; (foreign) exchange student
liúxīn to keep a lookout; careful
liúniàn to keep as a souvenir; to recall fondly
liúqíng to relent (to spare sb's feelings); to show mercy or forgiveness; to forbear; lenient
liúyì to take care; mindful
liúyòng to continue in employment; to hold on to one's job; to continue using
liúshén (idiom) "Take care to..."; "Be careful of..."
liúkōng leave blank spaces in writing

traditional: 留給
liúgěi to set aside for

traditional: 留聲機
liúshēngjī gramophone

traditional: 留連
liúlián reluctant to leave
zìliúdì private plot allocated to an individual on a collective farm
